desc_corta: The latest and most interesting rhythm piano game.
desc_larga:
Rhythm Piano Music Tiles 2
The Perfect Fusion of Music and Challenge

I. Core Gameplay
Rhythm Piano Music Tiles 2 is a rhythm-based offline game where players tap descending black tiles onto the judgment line in sync with the music to complete combos. With minimalist visuals and dynamic soundtracks, the game transforms musical rhythm into fingertip thrills. Whether you're a beginner or a seasoned rhythm gamer, you'll discover tailored challenges in its progressively layered beats.

II. Diverse Music and Visual Spectacle
Featuring a vast library of songs spanning classical piano, pop hits, EDM, and indie tracks, each track is paired with a unique visual theme‚Äîfrom celestial keyboard light trails to cyberpunk neon stages. Synchronized audio-visual experiences immerse players in concert-like atmospheres. Iconic melodies like Canon in D and Twinkle Twinkle Little Star deliver fresh, innovative performances.

III. Precision Controls and Advanced Techniques
While the mechanics seem simple, mastery requires skill. Players must master combo timing, long-press swipes, and multi-tap sequences to conquer complex high-difficulty charts. Rapid-fire tiles test hand speed limits, while sudden "acceleration segments" challenge mental resilience. Compete globally through daily challenges and real-time multiplayer battles against up to 4 players.

IV. Personalized Experience and Social Interaction
The game supports custom music uploads, allowing players to convert local tracks into personalized soundtracks. Share these with friends via the community hub. Built-in modes like Master Mode offer endless combo challenges, while Co-op Mode enables duo play for high-difficulty duets. The AI-powered Rhythm Classroom analyzes player performance, providing targeted training advice to transform novices into rhythm masters.

V. Technological Innovation and Immersive Experience
Powered by advanced touch feedback technology, Rhythm Piano Music Tiles 2 achieves millisecond-level responsiveness, enhanced by vibration feedback and stereo sound effects that replicate real piano key sensations. A dynamic difficulty system adjusts chart intensity in real time, balancing fluidity and challenge. Offline mode ensures instant access, letting players enjoy musical healing during fragmented moments.

VI. Game Features:
 ¬∑ Simple graphics, intuitive controls‚Äîeveryone can play piano!
 ¬∑ Breathtaking rhythms that push hand-speed limits.
 ¬∑ Online multiplayer battles with up to 4 players on-screen.
 ¬∑ Share records with friends and compete globally via leaderboards.
 ¬∑ High-quality sound design for concert-like immersion.
 ¬∑ Progressive challenges with great rewards to boost self-improvement.

Conclusion
Rhythm Piano Music Tiles 2 transcends traditional rhythm games‚Äîit's a bridge connecting players to art. Through precise rhythm control, diverse music, and innovative gameplay design, it redefines the possibilities of rhythm gaming. Whether you're chasing high scores or seeking musical relaxation, this game lets you find your unique rhythm through fingertip motion.

Download now and embark on your piano conquest journey!

desc_corta: Explore the world, battle powerful Boss and test your limits
desc_larga:
Hero's Quest is a game where you play the role of a lovely hero, go around exploring the world, and challenge your fighting ability to reach the highest level in the limited energy range. Your mission is to reach the highest level as you can to get a lot of gold coins, new weapons and equipment to improve your stats.

Initially, you will have 20 energy points (EP). Trying to maintain or improve this stat so you can get high levels in the game. Every time you beat monsters and Bosses, you will get gold coins. The more monsters you beat, the more money you have and the faster you go on the adventure. The more you win, the faster you level up. The higher the level, the higher your ability to defeat the aggressive monsters encountered along the jorney.


During the game, you will gradually discover your abilities and find the most effective fighting style for yourself. That's the magic, it can be very rewarding to play and discover new strategies or relics combinations.

Explore the world and challenge yourself to reach the highest levels within limited energy!

‚Ä¢ Heroes and Skins ‚Ä¢
Hero‚Äôs Quest allows you to choose different characters to participate in thrilling battles, each hero have different bonus stats and wonderful pixel art skins. Heores can also be situational you'll have to chose the most suitable Hero for each scenario.

‚Ä¢ Skill Tree ‚Ä¢
Players can chose between multiple passive Skills to shape the gameplay the way they like. Skills are separated into different types ranging ranging from ofensive, defensive or utility skills.

‚Ä¢ Immersive world ‚Ä¢
Unlock multiple areas, where with powerful monsters enemies are waiting for you. Battle can be very intense the further you get. Players also need to defeat Bosses with outstanding power to unlock new Maps, Relics and Equipment.

‚Ä¢ Roguelite action ‚Ä¢
Roguelite is an evolution of the Roguelike genre, this means you still have to start the game from the beginning when the game is over, but you also have permanent upgrades to make each run easier and esiear while also making you progress further and further. The more you play, the more you progress!

‚Ä¢ Automatic battle ‚Ä¢
You'll find monsters along the map and your job is to choose the fights. Your focus should be on strategy, Hero and Relics combinations. Let the game do the rest.

‚Ä¢ Portrait orientation ‚Ä¢
Play the game anywhere with only one hand.

titulo_original: Idle Royale Inc. - Incremental Merge Battle Game
desc_corta: The Idle game for all Royale fans! Merge, Collect, Battle with friends
desc_larga:
Idle Royale Tycoon - Incremental Merge Battle Game is a game that promises to be a real treat for fans of Battle-Royal games and puzzle games alike. With its unique concept of "Weapon Merge," this game allows players to collect over 400 epic weapons, merge them, and discover and upgrade them to maximize their idle profit.

Get ready to enter a world of collecting and merging, relax and wonder with Idle Royale, the puzzle game that lets you merge objects to create new and exciting things. With a captivating storyline and breathtaking graphics, you'll embark on a journey through mystical lands, where you must solve challenging puzzles and merge weapons to save the world. With each new merge, you'll unlock powerful bonuses and rewards, giving you the power to create a world that is uniquely your own. So what are you waiting for? Download idle royale! today and experience the magic for yourself!

The game has a simple and straightforward objective: to build the largest weapon inventory possible and unlock different weapons and secret skins and rarities. To achieve this, players need to drag and drop weapon tiles to merge them and create even more powerful weapons. With the classic Match 2 3 gameplay at its core, the game is easy to learn but hard to master.

The game is perfect for those who love to play Battle-Royal games but are tired of the typical math and numbers. Instead, players get to immerse themselves in a world of weapons and puzzles, creating their own Battle-Royal Weapon Collection. With its easy-to-use interface and exciting gameplay, the game is sure to provide hours of entertainment for both kids and adults.

In addition to its addictive gameplay, Idle Royale Tycoon - Incremental Merge Battle Game boasts a range of features that make it stand out from the crowd. With multiplayer, RPG elements, tactics, upgrades, and rewards, this game has everything you need for hours of entertainment. There are also in-app purchases, progression, loot, PvP battles, achievements, challenges, quests, energy, crafting, skills, storyline, arena battles, boss battles, events, character customization, and free-to-play options, making it a truly comprehensive gaming experience.

With a crazy mix of familiar epic weapon skins and idle game modes, players can have a blast building and growing their own Idle Weapon inventory. And with the ability to compete with friends, players can take their Battle-Royal skills to the next level and see who can build the largest weapon inventory.

In conclusion, Idle Royale Tycoon - Incremental Merge Battle Game is a game that is not to be missed. With its unique concept, exciting gameplay, and range of features, it offers a gaming experience that is truly second to none. So download the game today and start building your own Battle-Royal Weapon Collection!

desc_corta: Fireboy and Watergirl: A Teamwork, puzzle, running and fun game for two players.
desc_larga:
FINALLY!

Fireboy and Watergirl is available on Android devices! and it's ONLINE! Worldwide!

Firegirl and Waterboy is an addicting TEAMWORK and fun game for two players. Help Firegirl and Waterboy to find the exit through the temple. Firegirl must avoid the water and Waterboy must avoid the fire, and be careful, spikes kills them both! You can collect bottles for extra points!

Features:

-Single player mode: Now you can play all levels by yourself tapping on character icon to switch between Firegirl and Waterboy.

-Cross-platform is available! Now you can play with all mobile devices!

-All levels are updating frequently. We suggest that you check the game every day and don't miss any updates and new levels! (You must quit and re-start the app to check latest updates!)

Notes:

-Because of this is an online multiplayer game, you can play with a Google account which is logged in OR you can play without a Google account, as a Guest too!

-We always care about and read our players' reviews/feedbacks and try to improve our app in this direction. Please continue to share your positive and negative comments. :)

-You can try to delete and re-download the app if something wrong happened. :(

Details and Instructions:

The game Fireboy and Watergirl is one of the most popular two player games by children out of the variety of online games and flash games.

Watergirl and Fireboy continuously find themselves in mysterious temples, each time trying to get out of them. To escape they must solve puzzles and collaborate with each other. You can either play alone and move each character at a time or try to move them together at the same time. But it is much more fun to play the game along with a friend or a sibling, so that each is playing as a different character.
(Some people confuse and think that the game is called a waterboy and firegirl or a child of water and child of the fire)

In each temple the boy and girl must run and jump between fire and water, you should know that Fireboy is immune to fire, so he can step freely in pools of boiling lava, but he must be careful from stepping into water. Watergirl is resistant to pools of water, but gets hurt when stepping in the lava. Both charachters should beware of any other spikes on the way. At each screen the goal is to get to the doors which will lead you to the next room in the temple. The Fireboy should come to the door marked in red and the Watergirl should find her way to the door marked with a blue sign. On their way, both characters should collect diamonds that have the same color as themselves. The faster you get to the doors of each screen the higher score and ranking you will get.

To find a solution for each screen, you have to step on buttons to trigger lifts, push boxes and bricks to help climb higher and move switches.

But there is more than just running and jumping over death pit. You will have to utilize some gold old fashioned teamwork, using one character to hold down switches or platforms to open the way for the other, and then finding a way to reunite them both at the end. Some levels simply want you to make your way through as fast as you can. Others will require you to move both heroes simultaneously. And still others need you to collect special items before you can leave. At the end of each, you'll be graded on your performance. If you like, you can go back and replay older levels to improve your rating, or practice your water and fire skills.

It features many pool game modes like 8 Ball, 9 Ball, UK 8 Ball, Snooker, Time Trial, Matrix Mode and Practice Mode. So if you're a billiards fan, there is something for you to play in Real Pool 3D.

Customise your pool table by choosing the color and cloth patterns you like.

In Time Trial you have a time limit of 4 minutes, in which you have to pocket balls as fast as you can to achieve more score. When you pocket more than one ball back to back, your multiplier will increase and which will boost your score and time.

In Matrix Mode, when you pocket a ball your score will be multiplied by the difference of your previous and current ball number if the current is more than the previous; but if the current is less, then your score is divided by the current ball number. So be careful.

Have you ever thought about playing billiards on a real table, Real Pool 3D is the perfect way to try a variety of games. Real life graphics and angles to help improve your skills. Play Practice mode if you just want to relax and play without any rules.

desc_corta: Wonderful adventures for children. Search for keys to unlock all the locks
desc_larga:
The game "Hippo in Search of Adventures" is an exciting educational game for kids about the adventures of Hippo and her younger brother, Ji. In this game, they solve riddles and search for keys to unlock doors in their home, in order to find their mom's old doll.

The main characters of the game are Hippo and her younger brother, Ji. They live with their mom and dad in a house where every room is filled with riddles and mysteries. The kids are curious and always ready for new adventures, so they will embark on a search for keys and solve riddles together with the player.

The game is designed for kids who love educational and developmental games. It is perfect for boys and girls who want to have fun while developing their logical and thinking abilities.

Each level of the game represents a new room in the house where Hippo and Ji must solve several riddles and find keys to unlock doors. After they find all the keys, they can progress to the next level and uncover a new mystery.

The game includes several surprises and bonuses that can help kids complete the level faster or gain additional points. For example, there may be a hidden secret passage or a closet with extra keys in the room.

The game helps develop children's logic, attention to detail, and thinking skills. In addition, it teaches kids new words and concepts that may be useful in school.

Don't miss the chance to embark on an exciting adventure with Hippo and Ji in their house and find their mom's old doll. Download the game "Hippo in Search of Adventures" on your mobile phone or tablet and start playing today!

desc_corta: Kids hospital and dentist Rosie Barkers are ready to treat teeth
desc_larga:
Our favorite characters from cartoon the Barkers are going to visit the new doctor in the kids hospital. They want to take care of their teeth. Guess, who is the new kids doctor? This is assistant Rosie! During the summer practice the city educational center has prepared a lot of interesting tasks for kids and invited them to learn about many interesting professions. And Rosie was really interested in the job of a dentist: how he works, takes care of teeth, deletes decay and performs difficult operations. That's why she decided to learn at a dental clinic. But who would be brave enough to visit an unskilled doctor? Of course, the Barkers family is going to be these reckless heroes. Rosie gathered all the family together and announced this "pleasant" news to them. Ones were happy about that, and other afraid of their teeth. What's gonna be next? What will be the end? A new exciting game for boys and girls tells this funny story. The Barkers now have their own private dentist!

Educational hospital for boys and girls is open! A new doctor dentist is ready to experiment with somebody's teeth! Help Rosie to perform her job perfect, so that nobody is hurt and everybody is happy. Today we are going to brush teeth, delete decay, use modern implants, cure broken teeth, put braces, make shots and even fight bacterial infection. Choose who will be the first patient: Max, Liza or Mom with Dad. Or, perhaps, it should be Kid, who has a strong toothache. But don't be afraid, let's start! You and curious Rosie are the doctors at the kids hospital. We have the whole hospital and a lot of modern tools. And the most important is, that you have a lot of patients who are waiting in the long queue. You need only to wear the mask, gloves and take dental drill! Ready or not, here I come!

The Barkers invite you to the world full of adventures and interesting useful stories. Learn a lot of new and interesting facts about different professions and play with favorite cartoon characters.

desc_corta: Merge numbers to clear the grid in this brain-teasing puzzle game !
desc_larga:
"Numbers Addict" is a captivating number puzzle game where numbers are more than just digits; they are the key to unlocking levels of fun and challenge. In this game, numbers must be skillfully dropped into a grid, where the main objective revolves around making additions to clear these numbers from the board. Every level presents a unique challenge, asking players to strategize their moves and think in numbers to progress.

The essence of "Numbers Addict" lies in its ability to transform numbers into a source of entertainment. Numbers are not just randomly placed; they require thoughtful consideration to ensure the grid can be cleared. Players find themselves deeply engrossed as they calculate the placement of numbers, making every decision count. The beauty of numbers is further highlighted in the various levels, each designed to test the player's affinity with numbers in different ways.

"Numbers Addict" elevates the concept of number puzzles by introducing elements that require players to not just work with numbers, but to think in numbers. This game makes numbers your allies in the quest to conquer the grid. It's not just about adding numbers; it's about understanding the strategic placement that will yield the highest scores and most satisfying clears. Numbers become a language that players learn to speak fluently as they advance through the game.

This game ensures that numbers are always at the forefront of the player's mind. Each level is a new opportunity to explore the potential of numbers, challenging players to harness their numerical abilities to succeed. The satisfaction derived from solving a particularly tough level by manipulating numbers effectively is immense, making "Numbers Addict" a rewarding experience for those who love to engage with numbers.

"Numbers Addict" also introduces competitive elements, where numbers become the basis of competition among players. Leaderboards and achievements are tied directly to how effectively players can manage numbers, adding an extra layer of motivation to excel. Numbers are not just passive elements; they are the active core of every challenge and achievement within the game.

Designed for both casual and hardcore fans of number puzzles, "Numbers Addict" ensures that numbers are accessible and engaging to all. Beginners can find joy in the simple pleasure of clearing numbers, while advanced players can delve into the complexities of number strategies. Numbers serve as both the challenge and the solution, making every level a testament to the player's numerical prowess.

The game's interface is meticulously crafted to make the interaction with numbers as intuitive and enjoyable as possible. The visual presentation of numbers, the feedback on successful combinations, and the overall aesthetic are all designed with the player's numerical journey in mind. Numbers are not just part of the game's design; they are the heart of the gameplay experience.

desc_corta: Fun phonics & alphabet tracing game for toddlers, preschool & kindergarten kids!
desc_larga:
Looking for a fun, free, and simple educational app to help your toddler learn phonics and trace letters of the alphabet? Look no further than ABC Kids.

ABC Kids is a free phonics and alphabet teaching app that makes learning fun for children, from toddlers all the way to preschoolers and kindergartners. It features a series of tracing games to help kids recognize letter shapes, associate them with phonic sounds, and put their alphabet knowledge to use in fun matching exercises. Any toddler, kindergartener or preschool age child can learn English and the English alphabet simply by following the arrows with their finger. They can even collect stickers and toys as they complete tracing games!

ABC Kids is more than just a kid-friendly educational app, it was designed with adult participation in mind, too. The interface keeps toddlers focused on alphabet reading and writing, tucking menu commands away from moving fingers. Adults can easily access settings to engage Teacher Mode, look at report cards, or toggle tracing and phonics games to better facilitate learning.

Best of all, ABC Kids is full-featured and free from in-app purchases and third party advertisements. Toddlers and adults can enjoy learning together without interruption.

Features:
- A colorful early education app that helps children learn the English alphabet.
- Includes ABC tracing games, phonics pairing, letter matching, and more.
- Uppercase and lowercase letters to trace, listen to, and match.
- Smart interface helps kids focus on phonics and letters without accidentally exiting the game.
- No third party ads, no in-app purchases, no tricks. Just pure educational fun!

Note to Parents:
When creating ABC Kids, we wanted to build the best experience possible for both adults and for children. We're parents ourselves, and we know how paywalls, in-app purchases, and intrusive third party advertisements can detract from the learning experience. With ABC Kids, we put the features of a paid app into a preschool friendly package, leaving out frustrating pop-ups and microtransactions. The end result is exactly the educational experience we want for our children. We think you and your family will enjoy it!

- Best wishes from the parents at RV AppStudios

New York, 1955. It's become dangerous in the city. The mafia is trying to seize power. But recently, a new force appeared. A far more terrible force. titulo_original: TV Listings Guide UK - Cisana TV+
titulo_store: TV Listings Guide UK Cisana TV
desc_corta: TV Guide listings Freeview and Sky TV channels in the UK and Ireland
desc_larga:
Cisana TV + is a TV guide for UK and IE DTT and satellite television. Thanks to the complete 7-day schedule of each broadcaster, you can plan in advance which programs to watch on television in a quick, simple and intuitive way.
Cisana TV guide UK includes listings of all Britain's Freeview and Sky channels and main Irish TV channels.

For programs currently on air, a bar is shown that visually indicates how long the broadcast has started and how long it is until the end of the broadcast. You have a handy timeline for an overview of the schedules and sections where only movies, sports programs and cartoons are listed. You can set your favourite channels in order to make the consultation faster.

The plots of the programs, often with cast, rating, posters and images, will help you choose the program to watch. Cisana TV + offers you the possibility to insert a reminder for the start of a program that you want to see on the calendar of your smartphone or set a notification. Thanks to the connection with external websites you can learn more about the programs that interest you. Of course, you can share a broadcast profile with your friends that they might like too.

In a fraction of a second, it searches the titles and the description of the programs for all the weekly programming. Want to know when a match will air? When will the rerun of a TV series air? Now it's that simple!

CisanaTV + for a possible view of the streaming programs, if available, refer to the website or the official app of the individual television broadcasters.

Note: on some phone models notifications may not work, it does not depend on the app but on restrictions in the execution of apps in the background imposed by the smartphone software. In this case, we suggest trying to set the app so that it is not subject to energy savings and that it can start in the background. If the problem is not solved, all that remains is to set the reminders through the calendar.

desc_corta: Fight feudal wars and build an Empire. Conquer an epic RPG tycoon game simulator

desc_corta: It's a billiard game with 8 ball rules.
desc_larga:
It is a game where you hit the target ball between 1 and 15 using a white ball and put it in
The 1st to 7th is the color ball, and the 9th to 15th is the striped ball. If you put all the target ball in your pocket and put the 8th ball in the end, you win.

[How to play]
- Rotating the cue stick clockwise or counterclockwise by dragging it around the white ball.
- Pressing the billiard table may change the cue direction to the pressed position.
- The right scroll lever on the screen can be operated to fine-tune the rotation of the cue.
- Pressing the ball-shaped button on the top of the UI to rotate the white ball.

[Special feature]
- You can enjoy multi-play billiard matches with users around the world.
- You can challenge various stages with different stage setting.
- You can overcome the crisis by using 2 items in stage mode.
- You can play practice games with A.I player in practice mode.
- You can change the different shapes of cue sticks or increase the ability of the them.
- Provided a two-person mode on one device.
- Supported achievements and the leaderboard.
- Supported 16 languages.

desc_corta: Merry Christmas! Meet Hippo's advent calendar game for kids
desc_larga:
Winter is here, and it means that Christmas is up to come. Kids and their parents wait for a real miracle to happen. Santa Claus has prepared exciting presents for every member of the family. While Santa Claus is gathering all the presents in his bag and preparing for his long journey, our curious Hippo made up a present for every kid and parent. It is Hippo Advent Calendar. Kids Advent Calendar for all the family is a new game from our Developing Mini Games!

Christmas is the most awaited holiday ever. Everybody waits for holidays much. This Advent Calendar was created to make holiday waiting lighter and to create the Holiday spirit. Before holidays every day millions of kids and adults all over the world open the windows of the beloved Advent Calendar. They can find sweets, souvenirs, toys, funny pictures and good wishes there. And our Advent Calendar is also full of such surprises! Unforgettable adventures, funny puzzles, interesting riddles and other activities for boys and girls, for adults and kids are inside! And all these surprises could be yours!

Meet the holidays with Hippo, open Advent Calendar and get involved into funny winter adventures. Solve Christmas riddles and puzzles. Merry Christmas! Let this holiday give you a lot of fun and happiness! Follow Hippo and stay tuned! Our Developing Family Mini Games and activities for boys and girls and for all the families will always make you and your kids happy.

ABOUT HIPPO KIDS GAMES
Founded in 2015, Hippo Kids Games stands as a prominent player in mobile game development. Specializing in creating fun and educational games tailored for kids, our company has carved a niche for itself by producing over 150 unique applications that have collectively garnered over 1 billion downloads. With a creative team dedicated to crafting engaging experiences, ensuring that children worldwide are provided with delightful, educational, and entertaining adventures at their fingertips.

desc_corta: Visit countries, build a zoo, cook or dress up Hello Kitty.
desc_larga:
Are you ready to discover the world traveling with Hello Kitty?

Now,  with Hello Kitty Discovering the World you can travel to more than 50 countries and you will be able to...

-	Build your own Zoo with animals from all countries.
-	Prepare the food for Hello Kitty in her incredible kitchen.
-	Dress Hello Kitty with the traditional clothes and accessories of each country.
-	Learn Geography, know the countries, their location, their data, their flag and much more.

Prepare the suitcase and start your trip. You just have to select a country to visit... The United States, Italy, Germany ... .In each country you will know and follow its form and characteristics, draw its flag, place it on its continent and the most important thing ... you can get food, animals, monuments or dresses from each of them.

Collect all the animals from each of the countries and build the best zoo in the world:

-	Choose the terrain of each zone.
-	Build the roads.
-	Place the fences and doors.
-	Put each of the animals in their proper habitat.
-	And you can give it life by adding kiosks, Hello Kitty characters, vehicles, etc ...

Prepare Hello Kitty food with the food of each country:

-	A complete kitchen where there is nothing missing.
-	Use your imagination to make your own creations and surprise Hello Kitty.
-	Use the blender, the pan, the fryer or the grill for cooking.
-	Season the food with sauces and spices.
-	Feed Hello Kitty and she will show you if she likes it, if it is horrible or if she does not even want to try it.

Dress up Hello Kitty:

-	Get the traditional dresses of each country.
-	Use the accessories of each dress.
-	Dress up Hello Kitty with more than 50 dresses and accessories.
-	Have fun combining dresses and accessories from different countries and cultures.
-	Only you choose how you want to dress her.

Collect the wonders of the world

-	Get images of the most characteristic objects, monuments or places.
-	Create your own album of memories by placing the photos in the Hello Kitty album.
-	Bring the map to life by unlocking the monuments of each country.
-	Learn with the file and characteristics of each country.

CHARACTERISTICS:

-	Fun interactive games for girls and boys from 4 years old.
-	Encourages autonomous learning.
-	With Hello Kitty children learn geography by placing countries and continents on the map, tracking them and drawing their flags.
-	Power imagination and creativity.
-	They make their own meals mixing ingredients, cooking and testing if Hello Kitty likes it.
-	Build your own zoo by selecting the terrain, roads, characters and add your animals.
-	Develop creativity by combining dresses and accessories typical of all countries.
-	Motivate learning with gamification systems for children.
-	Get food, animals, monuments and dresses from each country you visit.
-	Application supervised by child educators. 
-	Available in 7 languages: English, Spanish, French, Italian, German, Russian,  and Portuguese.

For more detailed information about Hello Kitty Discovering the World,  please 

visit: http://www.taptaptales.com
